name: sdku
description:
sdku is a revamped version of the traditional game sudoku requiring players to exercise their brains and think on their feet.

rotary mode in practice.

new gamemodes:

  • perfect mode: incorrect actions result in failure
  • stopwatch mode: the player must act every ten seconds
  • expert mode: disables the default helpers
  • rotary mode: the board rotates 90° every action
